ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Trade skill upgrades
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve had the exact same problems. I m stranded at 104 and just cannot keep up with the amount it takes to get steady skill imps. In my rush to level I don t
ygData.messageBody:
I've had the exact same problems. I'm stranded at 104 and just cannot keep up
with the amount it takes to get steady skill imps. In my rush to level I
don't have time to stop somewhere and just farm cash, it takes too much
money, if they don't implement a cheaper way raise skills, I'm gonna have to
schedule a meeting with my foot and and the trade skill prgrammers balls. I
don't know about all of yall, but it's a little frustrating trying to raise
skill this way.
